summary: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.
cast: Cliff Curtis|Chipo Chung|Cillian Murphy|Michelle Yeoh|Hiroyuki Sanada|Rose Byrne|Benedict Wong|Chris Evans|Troy Garity|Mark Strong|Paloma Baeza|Archie Macdonald|Sylvie Macdonald|Kevin Hudson
title: Sunshine
